name: Badge Row
description: A flex-wrapped row of Badge components for tags, categories, skills, and status collections. Controls overflow gracefully and prevents arbitrary color usage for status mapping.
notes: flex-wrap with gap-1.5 is the canonical badge row layout. Cap visible badges with slice() and add a +N remainder badge when overflow matters.

variations.name: Outline
variations.description: All badges use the secondary/outline style — for neutral tag collections without semantic meaning.

variations.name: Mixed Variants
variations.description: Each badge carries its own semantic variant — for status collections where each item has a different state.
